languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, скверна просочились на Веабос-6! Культисты Последнего восхода подбили каторжан на восстание. Они пообещали заключенным возможность побега. Планетарный грузовой порт и комплексы надзирателей в осаде!"

"Corruption has infiltrated Vheabos VI, Lord Captain! The cultists of the Final Dawn have agitated the convicts into a full-blown uprising, promising them a chance at escape. The planet's cargo port and guard facilities are now under siege!"
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, скверна просочились на Веабос-6! Культисты Последнего восхода подбили каторжан на восстание. Они пообещали заключенным возможность побега. Планетарный грузовой порт и комплексы надзирателей в осаде!"

traits.locale_text: "The corruption has infiltrated Vheabos-VI, Lord Captain! The cultists of the Cult of the Final Dawn have raised the convicts in an uprising by promising them a chance to escape. The planet's cargo port and warden facilities are now under siege!"

"Corruption has infiltrated Vheabos VI, Lord Captain! The cultists of the Final Dawn have agitated the convicts into a full-blown uprising, promising them a chance at escape. The planet's cargo port and guard facilities are now under siege!"

languages.text: “腐化渗透到了维博斯六号星，舰长大人！终末黎明邪教的信徒鼓动囚犯发动全面暴乱，承诺会带领他们逃脱这座监狱。现在，那颗行星的货运港口和监狱已经被包围了！”
languages.original_text: "Corruption has infiltrated Vheabos VI, Lord Captain! The cultists of the Final Dawn have agitated the convicts into a full-blown uprising, promising them a chance at escape. The planet's cargo port and guard facilities are now under siege!"

traits.locale_text: “腐化渗透到了维博斯六号星，舰长大人！终末黎明邪教的信徒鼓动囚犯发动全面暴乱，承诺会带领他们逃脱这座监狱。现在，那颗行星的货运港口和监狱已经被包围了！”
“腐化渗透到了维博斯六号星，舰长大人！终末黎明邪教的信徒鼓动囚犯发动全面暴乱，承诺会带领他们逃脱这座监狱。现在，那颗行星的货运港口和监狱已经被包围了！”

languages.text: «¡La corrupción se ha infiltrado en Vheabos VI, Lord Capitán! Los cultistas del Amanecer Final han empujado a los convictos a la rebelión abierta, prometiéndoles la oportunidad de escapar. ¡El puerto de mercancías del planeta y las instalaciones de los guardias están bajo asedio!».
languages.original_text: "Corruption has infiltrated Vheabos VI, Lord Captain! The cultists of the Final Dawn have agitated the convicts into a full-blown uprising, promising them a chance at escape. The planet's cargo port and guard facilities are now under siege!"

traits.locale_text: «¡La corrupción se ha infiltrado en Vheabos VI, Lord Capitán! Los cultistas del Amanecer Final han empujado a los convictos a la rebelión abierta, prometiéndoles la oportunidad de escapar. ¡El puerto de mercancías del planeta y las instalaciones de los guardias están bajo asedio!».

languages.text: 「ヴィアボス・VIに腐敗が浸透しています、ロード・キャプテン！最後の夜明けカルトの信者たちは、受刑者たちを本格的な蜂起へと扇動し、奴らに逃亡のチャンスを約束しました。惑星の貨物港と看守の施設が今包囲されています！」
languages.original_text: "Corruption has infiltrated Vheabos VI, Lord Captain! The cultists of the Final Dawn have agitated the convicts into a full-blown uprising, promising them a chance at escape. The planet's cargo port and guard facilities are now under siege!"

traits.locale_text: 「ヴィアボス・VIに腐敗が浸透しています、ロード・キャプテン！最後の夜明け魔女団の信者たちは、受刑者たちを本格的な蜂起へと扇動し、奴らに逃亡のチャンスを約束しました。惑星の貨物港と看守の施設が今包囲されています！」
「ヴィアボス・VIに腐敗が浸透しています、ロード・キャプテン！最後の夜明け魔女団の信者たちは、受刑者たちを本格的な蜂起へと扇動し、奴らに逃亡のチャンスを約束しました。惑星の貨物港と看守の施設が今包囲されています！」

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur|Seigneure}-capitaine, la corruption frappe Vhéabos-VI ! Les cultistes de l'Aube finale ont poussé les détenus à se révolter, leur promettant des chances de s'évader. Le port de marchandises de la planète et les baraquements des gardiens sont assiégés ! »
languages.original_text: "Corruption has infiltrated Vheabos VI, Lord Captain! The cultists of the Final Dawn have agitated the convicts into a full-blown uprising, promising them a chance at escape. The planet's cargo port and guard facilities are now under siege!"

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur|Seigneure}-capitaine, la corruption frappe Vhéabos-VI ! Les cultistes de l'Aube finale ont poussé les détenus à se révolter, leur promettant des chances de s'évader. Le port de marchandises de la planète et les baraquements des gardiens sont assiégés ! »

languages.text: "Die Verderbnis hat Vheabos-VI befallen, Lord Captain! Die Kultisten der letzten Dämmerung haben die Sträflinge zu einem Aufstand angestachelt, indem sie ihnen die Chance auf eine Flucht versprachen. Der Frachthafen und die Wachstationen werden belagert!"
languages.original_text: "Corruption has infiltrated Vheabos VI, Lord Captain! The cultists of the Final Dawn have agitated the convicts into a full-blown uprising, promising them a chance at escape. The planet's cargo port and guard facilities are now under siege!"

traits.locale_text: "Die Verderbnis hat Vheabos-VI befallen, Lord Captain! Die Kultisten der letzten Dämmerung haben die Sträflinge zu einem Aufstand angestachelt, indem sie ihnen die Chance auf eine Flucht versprachen. Der Frachthafen und die Wachstationen werden belagert!"

"Die Verderbnis hat Vheabos-VI infiltriert, Lord Captain! Die Kultisten vom Kult der letzten Dämmerung haben die Sträflinge zu einem ausgewachsenen Aufstand angestachelt, indem sie ihnen die Chance auf eine Flucht versprochen haben. Der Frachthafen und die Wachstationen werden belagert!"

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, Vheabos VI'yı yozluk sarmış durumda! Nihai Şafak tarikatçıları, hükümlüleri tahrik ederek isyan çıkmasına yol açmış. Mahkûmlara kaçış sözü vermişler. Gezegenin kargo iskelesi ve muhafız tesisleri kuşatma altında!"
languages.original_text: "Corruption has infiltrated Vheabos VI, Lord Captain! The cultists of the Final Dawn have agitated the convicts into a full-blown uprising, promising them a chance at escape. The planet's cargo port and guard facilities are now under siege!"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan, Vheabos VI'yı yozluk sarmış durumda! Nihai Şafak tarikatçıları, hükümlüleri tahrik ederek isyan çıkmasına yol açmış. Mahkûmlara kaçış sözü vermişler. Gezegenin kargo iskelesi ve muhafız tesisleri kuşatma altında!"
